name: PIG STICKER
description:
Welcome to PIG STICKER! 

This is a prototype of a very basic mini game that actually going to be one of many that will eventually be apart of the main game I am making called JonoWORLD. PIG STICKER is a despicable little creature that lurks in the woods. Watching people. This is your chance to STICK the PIG!   

Press A and D to move Left and Right. Press space to try again! How long can you last?

I thought it was finally time to make and release my first video game. We all start somewhere! Although hilariously rough, I shall refine this game so its isn't just a prototype!

I've uploaded PIG STICKER for both Windows and Mac OSX.

Anyway, its just a bit of fun and I'm already making a small  first person exploration game next!

Jono
